title: What are the features in Redmi not 9? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Features of Redmi Note 9 are:- Operating System. Android v10 (Q)6.53 inches (16.59 cm) bezel-less display with punch-hole display.Design. Splashproof.MediaTek Helio G85 Octa core Processor. 3 GB RAM.48 + 8 + 2 + 2 MP Quad Rear Cameras.5020 mAh battery with Fast Charging.Dual SIM with VoLTE support.
